body:
Comment 1: 
I'm tempted to say "don't do that."

Cgo is written to be executed in from the root package path. Cgo expects to translate
paths like "foo/bar" to "foo_bar", so "../gmp" is translated to ".._gmp". Maybe it
should error out in that case. 

With that said, I believe Russ is working on removing the need for generating .so files,
so this might become redundant soon. Russ?
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
